brief_title: Study of an Approved Drug With a Statin (a Medication That Lowers Cholesterol Levels) as Compared to Statin Therapy Alone in Patients With High Cholesterol (0653-040)
brief_summary: The purpose of this 6-week study is to compare the reduction in specific levels of cholesterol in patients with high cholesterol.
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 6 weeks.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - High cholesterol levels that are identified by specific laboratory values Exclusion Criteria: - Active liver disease - Any condition or situation which would interfere with participation
